title: Community-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Online Learning Transition Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform experience and foundational understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Practical training using simulations and VR for pre-service/in-service teachers to effectively respond to post-pandemic online learning environments, with community-based activities to enhance peer learning and collaboration skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional design principles for transitioning to online learning
Learners design and implement online lesson scenarios at least once using VR-based simulations
Learners provide and incorporate peer feedback at least three times using community collaboration tools
Learners can apply five or more strategies to promote learner engagement in online learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
